metadata.name: Dressed Up
metadata.description:
Early spring, the snow only made things even more romantic and beautiful than they were. 
I don't know what I was expecting, but surely not this.
Traditions are changing and this is not necessarily a bad thing. People are amazing!
This was supposed to be the Bulgarian traditional festival where people wear animal fur costumes, chimes and dance in the streets to scare the evil away. 
Well it seems you can do that in any costume :)
